column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is easily my favorite restaurant in Chicago!!  I've been to Iberico and others
column2: and although this may not be the most 100% authentic of them all
column3: it has the atmosphere and food to blow the others out of the water!  Expect to wait at least an hour
column4: but always knock about 30 mins off of the time they tell you..there has never been a time that they say it will be a 2 hour wait and it ends up only being 90 mins!  It's well worth the wait
column5: the bar is awesome with to-die-for sangria!
